name: NALOGI
description: NALOGI - bright satirical game in the genre of RPG. This includes a casino, church, gangsters, bureaucracy and arbitrariness of the authorities. Win and destroy the system or pay taxes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 18 Ghz or faster Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
